page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: {RECREATION FACILITIES}IN MANSFIELD FALL INTO TWO GROUPS:THOSE ORGANISED BY DISTRICT COUNCIL LEISURE SERVICES DEPARTMENT AND THOSE RUN PRIVATELY.OF THOSE ORGANISED BY THE LEISURE SERVICES DEPARTMENT, CAN BE BOASTED ANNUAL EVENTS SUCH AS THE STARS AND STRIPES HALF MARATHON,CARNIVALS ETC. OTHER FACILITIES INCLUDE THE CIVIC THEATRE WHICH PROMOTES TOP NAMES, AS WELL AS ENCOURAGING AMATEUR GROUPS.THE MUSEUM AND ART GALLERY EXPOSE FIRST-CLASS EXHIBITIONS.THERE ARE LEISURE CENTRES PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR A VARIETY OF SPORTING ACTIVITIES. SAUNA BATHS AND SWIMMING POOLS PROVIDE AN ADDED ATTRACTION.
